Wordpress Resources

Below are themes and plugins that I have tested and found to be useful.

Themes

  • Maker A very minimal theme.
  • Me - Another very minimal theme.
  • Zillah - A solid, simple theme.
  • Magnus - A photo-heavy theme.

Plugins

  • Page Builder by SiteOrigin - Create flexible page layouts. Note: does not work well with some other plugins.
  • SiteOrigin Widgets Bundle A collection of widgets used with the Page Builder plugin.
  • MasterSlider - An easy-to-use image slider.
  • WP Google Maps - Add customizable Google Maps to your site.
  • Parallax Scroll - Add a parallax section to posts or pages.
  • Easy Smooth Scroll Links - Create links that scroll to page sections.
  • Disable Comments - Easily disable and hide comments.
